choices: I want to be a different kind of digimon
1.content: Hello! And welcome fair traveler! I am here to help you get started on your adventure to a wild and dangerous world. However, you don't need to go alone with this you can take a partner with you with this journey. You can also be transformed into a digimon as well. So take your pick. What do want to be?
1.title: Into the digital world

11.content: Ok are you male or female?
11.title: I'll be by myself

111.content:
Final question before we get down to it. Which of these is closest to your age?

Your level of maturity may have an effect on how well you can deal with Digimon and how they'll respond to you. A child won't be able to fight back as effectively as an adult, but Digimon might consider attacking an adult more fair game than attacking a child.
111.title: Male

1112.content:
Alright then! Welcome to the Digital World. Be careful, and have fun!

Or get eaten and be digested. Whichever you prefer really.
---------------------


You awaken, laying on the ground with a splitting headache. Above you is a canopy of trees, branches swaying in a gentle breeze. Sitting up, you look at your surroundings in confusion. An unfamiliar, lush forest surrounds you in all directions. You're not sure how you got here. There are some vague flashes in your mind. Something about using some kind of special computer? Maybe you can remember if you stay here for a bit and think.

Then again, you have no idea what else is in the forest with you. A further glance around shows that the trees noticeably start to get less dense in one direction. A way out perhaps? In the other direction the trees don't get thicker, but you see signs of some kind of tracks. If there are wild animals about, following them might you lead you to a landmark of some sort. Of course, if the animals are predatory... you don't want to think about that.
1112.title: 14-16 years old, teenager

choices: Catch up with whatever left these tracks
Head into the bushes to see what's there
11122.content:
Your curiosity gets the better of you. You need to see where the tracks go. Or what left them. You don't know why, you just do. Upon closer inspection the prints are some kind of clawed paws. You're no expert on animals, but the paw prints are pretty large. So a large animal with paws? You hope it's a friendly animal. You can't really guess what pace the creature that left the pawprints was taking, so you just walk.

The trail is long, and you feel like you've been following it for ages when you finally notice some kind of payoff. Sounds in the distance. Pausing, your realize there are two different sounds. The first comes from further along the path you're following. A gentle trotting sound. You're not sure how many legs the thing you're following has on sound alone, so still no idea what you're following, but at least you caught up. The second sound is a rustling, slowing gaining distance from you in the brush to your right. You guessed you spooked something.

You could go after the thing you spooked, just for curiosity's sake, but if you do the animal you're following will get away from you again, and you may waste a lot of time left in the day finding your way back to the trail it's left. On the other hand, if you hurry to catch up the thing you're following, you probably won't be able to find whatever you spooked later.
11122.title: Follow the tracks

12.content: one of the digidestined but what season?
12.title: I'll go with a partner

123.content: Which Tamers would it be?
123.title: digimon tamers

13.content: Alrighty then! What's your gender and are you alone?
13.title: I'll be a digimon

131.content: Ok then what digimon are you?
131.title: Male and Yes

1311.content: Are you an arthro or feral?
1311.title: Agumon

1313.content: More digital monsters to choose from:
1313.title: Next selection

13133.content: Maybe a friendly blue dragon ?
13133.title: Next Selection

132.content: Ok then what digimon are you?
132.title: Female and Yes

info.description: Hello and welcome to the digital world. However things have changed during this time and it's a dog eat dog world now or should I say mon eat mon world. You can start out either as a Human going solo, a Human with a partner, an arthro digimon or a normal digimon. Please no hard vore! It's ok to do scat/watersport (after meal effects) but please don't go into detail with that! Feel free to add on if you want to! Don't be shy! If you have something to jot down in this story then go for it! One more thing! Have fun with this story!
